name: Electric Wind God Fist Mastery
description: Practice Kazuya's Electric Wind God Fist (EWGF) consistently. Focus on precise execution of the input (f, n, d, df+2) with no delay.

name: Perfect Electric Wind God Fist Block Punish
description: Practice punishing blocked enemy moves with EWGF as fast as possible. Block and immediately perform EWGF.

name: Wave Dash Pressure
description: Practice Kazuya’s wave dash (f, n, d, df) movement to apply pressure on your opponent. Focus on using wave dash to mix up between attacks and throws.

name: Giant Swing Setup
description: Practice King’s Giant Swing throw (f, hcf+1) to catch opponents off guard. Focus on buffering the input from neutral to surprise the opponent.

name: Shining Wizard Combo
description: Work on executing King's Shining Wizard (f, f, f+2+4) after a successful hit or launcher. This move requires precise input after dashing.

name: Multi-Throw Chain Practice
description: Practice King’s multi-throw chain sequences. Focus on transitioning smoothly between throws and remembering the specific inputs to extend the throw sequence.

name: Dragon Tail Whiff Punish
description: Practice punishing Law’s Dragon Tail (d+3+4) when it whiffs. Work on immediately punishing with a fast move after you block or sidestep.

name: Legendary Dragon Rush Combo
description: Focus on performing Law's legendary Dragon Rush combo (f+3, 1, 2, 1, 2). Ensure all hits connect, especially in juggle situations.

name: Movement and Sidestep Mastery
description: Practice Law’s movement options, focusing on sidestepping and backdashing. Use sidesteps to avoid linear attacks and create whiff opportunities.

name: Lidia's Jab Punish
description: Focus on using Lidia’s fast jab (1, 1) to punish small openings. Practice punishing whiffs and unsafe moves from opponents with jabs.

name: Karate High-Low Mixup
description: Master Lidia's high-low mixups using her Karate stance (df+1+2) to confuse the opponent. Alternate between high and low attacks from the stance.

name: Lidia's Wall Carry Combo
description: Work on Lidia’s wall carry combos. Start with a launcher, then focus on connecting hits that lead to the wall for maximum damage.
